remarks: The predicate "is a complete lattice."  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.)  (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement:
isclat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isclat.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
isclat.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
isclat $p |- ( K e. CLat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom U = ~P B /\ dom G = ~P B ) ) ) $.
